dmca.title: A Simple threat
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. [recipient]:

Please accept this demand that you immediately retract the defamatory statements and reasonable inferences thereof, published by you of and concerning [Private].  The retraction must be published within 5 days from the date hereof, in as prominent and public a place or manner as the false materials published.
 
Yours very truly,
GALESE & INGRAM, P.C.

[Private]

[Private]
